details: Mo Willems invites YOU into his studio every day for his LUNCH DOODLE. Learn to draw, doodle and explore new ways of writing by visiting Mo’s studio virtually once a day for the next few weeks. New episodes will be posted each weekday at 1:00 p.m. ET and then remain online to be streamed afterwards.

Each day, a different encore presentation from the company’s Live in HD series is being made available for free streaming on the Met website, with each performance available for a period of 23 hours, from 7:30 p.m. EDT until 6:30 p.m. the following day.

activity: Live Concert - Vince Gill, Brad Paisley, and Marty Stuart
details: Nashville's venerated Opry will continue to stream shows without an in-house audience on Saturday, March 21, with Vince Gill, Brad Paisley and Marty Stuart. In addition to streaming live, the show will also broadcast live on Circle Network.

New episodes will be posted each weekday at 1:00 p.m. ET and then remain online to be streamed afterwards.
Join country singer Chris Young LIVE for Sunday Funday. Young will perform and answer questions with assistance from his pup, Porter.
Vanessa Carlton will host an Instagram Live performance every day at 5 p.m. CT starting Sunday, March 22 until Thursday, March 27 when she releases her sixth album Love Is An Art.

Each day, a different encore presentation from the company’s Live in HD series is being made available for free streaming on the Met website, with each performance available for a period of 23 hours, from 7:30 p.m. EDT until 6:30 p.m. the following day.
Mr Jon & Friends make music for kids and their families! This energetic family music is all about fun, movement, and laughter!

New episodes will be posted each weekday at 1:00 p.m. ET and then remain online to be streamed afterwards.

activity: Draw with NYT bestselling Illustrator Wendy MacNaughton
details: Wendy MacNaughton, the well-known illustrator for the art for Salt, Fat, Acid, Heat, launched a daily drawing class on Instagram for “kids of all ages, parents of kids, parents of parents, aunties/uncles, friends and pets.” Stories available live and for 24 hours after.

activity: Draw Every Day: Drawing lessons with illustrator Jarrett J. Krosoczka
details: Learn to draw M-F with drawing lessons and games by illustrator Jarrett J. Krosoczka
Watch a virtual concert of Brandy Clark from the  home concerts seriens #togetherathome

Each concert will be on STAATSOPER.TV, live and free of charge: The programme of the Monday Concerts will consist of Lied, solo instrumentalists, chamber music and dance. Musicians of the Bayerisches Staatsorchester, dancers of the Bayerisches Staatsballett, and artists closely associated with the house will participate over the next couple of weeks.
